name: Slice of Life
description:
Experience a twisting narrative filled with interesting friends and foes. Slice of Life features fast-paced arcade-style tennis action, a deep perk-based customization system and many
character driven storylines and social links. With tons of Sub-Games and several local multiplayer modes, you'll have a packed semester at Rosegate University.
intro: What Will We Do Today? Step into the shoes of Drake Lacasse as he starts a new life at Rosegate University. Battle on the court and search for answers to your past.
